instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
instructions.2: Pour melted butter into the bottom of a 9x13-inch glass baking dish.
instructions.3: Mix milk, flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt together in a small bowl; pour over butter in the baking dish. Arrange strawberry halves in a layer in the baking dish. Dot strawberries with cream cheese pieces.
instructions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until the top is golden brown and the edges are bubbling, 30 to 45 minutes.

questions.question: In Step 4, is the oven from Step 1 being used?
Is oven from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is baking powder from Step 3 still available in Step 4?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 4?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the oven in Step 4?
Can we pour (Step 2) and mix (Step 3) at the same time?
